No SNAP

Schedule the interview within the first 4 days.

But the worker has no availability!

Expedited

Not Expedited

If the worker is not available, then schedule the interview as soon as the worker is available from day 5 - 7. If the worker is still not available, do not schedule the appointment. Screenshot the worker's unavailability and email worker, cc worker's supervisor, CSS supervisor, and benefits manager.

If the worker is not available within the first four days, then schedule the interview ASAP from day 5 - 30.

Congratulations!

You don't have to schedule any appointment or print any paper!
Unless there is a new TANF application. See your senior worker!
